scripts.postinstall: apt-get update && apt-get install -y wget gnupg && wget https://dl.google.com/linux/linux_signing_key.pub && apt-key add linux_signing_key.pub && sh -c 'echo "deb [arch=amd64] http://dl.google.com/linux/chrome/deb/ stable main" >> /etc/apt/sources.list.d/google-chrome.list' && apt-get update && apt-get install -y google-chrome-stable
